title: embirAn muruganayE
sahitya:
embirAn muruganaiyE nambi nAn uivEn


anupallavi

  nimmati kulaiyAmal nilaiyAi ninriDum nityAnandama adai iddharaNiyil peravE


caraNam    vAzhvidil menmEl vandu aDuttiDum Uzhvinait-tollaiyadu orupOdum en manadai
pAzh paDuttit-tuyarap-paDu kuzhiyil AzhttiDa vIzhtti viDAda peru vAzhvadanaip-peTriDa
